committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to increase the contribution by the Federal Government to the costs of employees' group life and health benefits insurance.

summary.text: Increases the contribution by the Federal Government to the costs of Federal employees' group life and health insurance. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8707, 8708(a) and 8906(b))

titles.title: A bill to increase the contribution by the Federal Government to the costs of employees' group life and health benefits insurance.
